description: Fetches emails from Gmail, analyzes content to extract key information (sender, subject, urgency, action items), generates a concise summary, and delivers it to the specified Slack channel

result.summary: The complete formatted email summary text including key information, urgency levels, and action items
result.slackChannelSent: The Slack channel ID or name where the summary was posted
result.timestamp: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the summary was generated
